name: TealNoise
0:
”Alexa open Teal Noise”
”Alexa ask Teal Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teal noise
des:
Discover a distinct variation of blue noise with this skill. Teal noise provides a different frequency range that can help in blocking out distractions and creating a soothing auditory environment for sleep or concentration.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Teal Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
